did.abstract: Papers and photograph of a soldier in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition."

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Suzanne Fleming, of Ann Arbor, Michigan, in 2005 and 2007 (Donor No. 9657).

accruals.p: No further additions to the papers are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Leroy Vincent Fleming papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Resident of Merrill, Mich., who served in Co. A, 310th Engineers, during the American intervention at Archangel, Russia. Fleming died in 1975.

scopecontent.p: The papers include Fleming's diary, 1918-1919, and transcripts of the diary. Also included are an undated portrait of Fleming and Sarah M. McInnis and photocopies of an undated diary, photographs, a map, and Russian money.

did.unittitle: Photocopies of photographs, a map, Russian money, and a diary, undated
